text:
This @Channel4News item re the effect of #COVID19 conspiracy on #NHS staff reminds me to highlight this doc from Drs. @johnfocook & @STWorg et al.

The focus is effective public communication about the #Covid19 #vaccine, particularly re debunking misinfo.

https://t.co/a1in4XcZ1v https://t.co/QLpFfwfObv
